toast.24h_error: Nie da się ćwiczyć więcej niż 24 godziny dziennie

exercise_plan.title: Did you fulfill your exercise plan?
exercise_plan.description: Setting goals and planning your guitar practice is important because it helps maintain motivation, track progress, and achieve desired goals.

new_things.title: Did you practice new things?
new_things.description: Practicing new things on the guitar is important for several reasons. First, it helps develop new skills and improve existing ones. By tackling new challenges, you can try to become a better musician and expand your abilities. Practicing new things can also help keep your interest in playing and add variety.

warmup.title: Did you warm up?
warmup.description: A warm up helps prepare your muscles and joints for the physical demands of playing. This can help reduce the risk of injury and make your practice sessions more comfortable. A warm up can also help improve technique and accuracy by getting your fingers and muscles working properly.

metronome.title: Did you use a metronome?
metronome.description: Using a metronome can help improve your sense of timing and rhythm. By practicing with a metronome, you can learn to play in time with a consistent beat and develop a more solid rhythmic foundation.

recording.title: Did you record yourself?
recording.description: Recording yourself allows you to see and hear your playing from a different perspective than when you play live. This can help you notice mistakes or weaknesses that you might have missed.

description.technique: Np. granie i nauka utworów, rozgrzewka, ćwiczenie rytmu oraz różnych technik, takich jak kostkowanie naprzemienne lub legato
description.hearing: Np. odtwarzanie utworów bądź ich fragmentów ze słuchu, słuchanie i wskazywanie interwałów oraz śpiewanie
description.theory: Np. transkrypcja utworów i ich analiza, nauka dźwięków na gryfie, czytanie nut
description.creative: Np. pisanie własnych utworów, improwizacja, praca nad własnym stylem
